typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		url as string,
		filename as string,
		filepath as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TripDataUrls
source(output(
		url as string,
		filename as string,
		filepath as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ZoneDataUrls
TripDataUrls, ZoneDataUrls union(byName: true)~> AllUrls
AllUrls alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRows
AlterRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		url as string,
		filename as string,
		filepath as string,
		downloaded as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['url'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		url,
		filename,
		filepath
	)) ~> SynapseConfigTable
